attributes.action: Stop taxing the Basic State Pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The State pension of £90.73 should not be taken into consideration for tax purposes.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop taxing the Basic State Pension."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12921.asp

Prime Minister's Office
